segments.text: What a girly drink . I'll take a bag of the Blue Mountain and a decaf breva ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You and your fancy Italian names .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't “ frappuccino ” Italian , too ? ... and heat me up a panini .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be fine with just my girly drink , thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I'll stick with real coffee .
segments.speaker: S2
